Hello to every one, I'm writing my tesis and at the end I found that the format APA 6th edition of my word is not what I need. So I been looking for the 5th edition, and is in any where. 
   What I need is a format of citation as this: Last name of the authors, initial of the name, (year of publication). title of the work, name of the magazine, vol: number of the pages.
   I know you could help me thanks.
